message:
英语渣翻译文献实在是憋不出来这两句中文是什么了
故求个翻译。。。可理解的中文即可
1.Therefore, one needs to pay special attention to the manufacturing processes, realize that there can be wide variability in the allowables data, and realize the need for a careful building-block test program to develop the design allowable data.
2.Figure 2 shows the dramatic reduction in compression after impact strength as a function of impact energy for a commonly used composite system.
总有一种这楼会没人理的感觉。。。
title: 走投无路来求个翻译。。。【已解决】
userSign: (苦海，泛起爱恨～～在世间，难逃命运～～～ ...)
